title: Apple Raised UK Banking Costs, Lawsuit Alleges
full_text: Apple Raised UK Banking Costs, Lawsuit Alleges. A new UK class action lawsuit against Apple seeks billions in damages by alleging that the company unlawfully restricted competition in contactless payments on the iPhone through Apple Pay, The Guardian reports. The proposed opt-out collective action fil….
